text: Renate Krößner, also Renate Krössner (17 May 1945 – 25 May 2020) was a German actress. She was known for her main role in the 1980 movie Solo Sunny. From 1985, she worked in West Berlin and was known for roles in TV series such as Tatort and Einmal Bulle, immer Bulle. She was born in Osterode am Harz, Lower Saxony. Krößner died on 25 May 2020 in Mahlow, Brandenburg at the age of 75. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1945 births Category:2020 deaths Category:German movie actors Category:German television actors Category:German stage actors Category:German voice actors Category:Actors from Lower Saxony
title: Renate Krößner
